abstract: Seaside town of Scituate, Mass, is hit hard by blizzard, with streets rendered impassable and homes sustaining major structural damage; state and town officials say solution to what seems to be increasing number of damaging storms has to go beyond simply repeatedly repairing Scituate's sea walls.
lead_paragraph: Scituate, on the Atlantic coast about 30 miles southeast of Boston, is not protected by Cape Cod directly to its east.
snippet: Scituate, on the Atlantic coast about 30 miles southeast of Boston, is not protected by Cape Cod directly to its east.

headline.main: Pounded Again, Coastal Massachusetts Town May Consider a Retreat
headline.print_headline: Pounded Again, Coastal Town May Consider a Retreat
